thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 12 of 571
thread.title: Jackie

author: Jackie
title: Jackie
text: People were friendly and helpful and the facilities seemed great and taken care of. However how customer service is handled over the phone can be real shady and concerning. Kept going around and around saying they were sorry prices went up between a single day, but they could guarantee prices would be locked for 6months, only to then be told that was a lie and prices can raise up to 30% in a 6 month period, but after THAT, it won't increase again for a year. However they refused to put anything in writing.
